Instructions for burning any video file (.avi, .mpeg, .rm, .swf, .gif, etc.) to a DVD that will play on any stand-alone DVD player. Includes a manual on how to correct audio sync errors, how to apply multiple subtitle tracks to a DVD, and a guide for converting video files to any format. All the software necessary for completing these tasks is included, with installation instructions, serial numbers, and all necessary patches. Some of the programs included: TMPGEnc Plus, DVD-Lab Pro, ImgBurn, All-Media-Fixer Pro, Subtitle Workshop, among many others.
